casebody.data:
SHAWMUT BANK CONNECTICUT, N.A. v. FRANK D. GIVEN ET AL. (14337)

Dupont, C. J., and Lavery and Schaller, Js.

Submitted on briefs November 3 decision released November 28, 1995 Joseph Chiarelli filed a brief for the appellants (named defendant et al.). Linda Clifford Hadley filed a brief for the appellee (substitute plaintiff). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed and the case is remanded for the purpose of setting new law days.
